label: 大納言
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Official of the Great Council of State (Dajōkan). Generally four in number. Acted as mouthpieces" of the Sovereign (Tennō), transmitting his imperial decrees (senji) to the government. Advised him, examined documents being presented to him. [太政官、天皇、宣旨]"
